titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Rice University Professional and Business Women records, 1985-1995 UA 242
titlestmt.author: Mary Tobin

publicationstmt.publisher: Woodson Research Center, Rice University, Houston, Texas

note.p: Stored offsite at the Library Service Center and require 24-hour notice for retrieval. Please contact the Woodson Research Center at 713-348-2586 or woodson@rice.edu for more information.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2022-04-02 12:58:34 -0500.

did.head: Collection Summary

repository.corpname: Woodson Research Center, Rice University, Houston, Texas

did.unittitle: Rice University Professional and Business Women records

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Rice University Professional and Business Women

did.abstract: The collection consists of the constitution, meeting announcements, calendars, directories, and newsletters of the Rice University Business and Professional Women for the years 1986 through 1995. It was created by Nancy Boothe, an archivist at Fondren Library, during the years when she was a member of the organization.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: The Rice University Business and Professional Women (RUBPW) was formed in the 1980s by a group of women Rice University alumnae for the purpose of forming friendships, networking, and hearing interesting speakers on topics related to business, the Rice community, or matters of general interest to intelligent people. The group meets monthly September through May, usually beginning with dinner at a noteworthy Houston restaurant. Members emphasize that it is not necessary to be an active career woman to participate. There are members who are not currently working outside the home or who may never have done so. The essential qualifications are an interest in Rice people and availability to attend evening meetings.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of records of the activities and the membership of the Rice University Business and Professional Women during the years 1986 through 1995. Included are the constitution, meeting announcements, information about outreach projects, directories, and newsletters.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: This material is open for research.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Stored offsite at the Library Service Center and require 24-hour notice for retrieval. Please contact the Woodson Research Center at 713-348-2586 or woodson@rice.edu for more information.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: This collection was a gift donated by Nancy Boothe.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Rice University Business and Professional Women Records, 1986-1995, UA242, Woodson Research Center, Fondren Library, Rice University

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the Rice University Business and Professional Women Records must be facilitated through the Woodson Research Center, Fondren Library.

did.unittitle: Series II: Meeting announcements, calendars, directories and newsletters
